name: Janosch: Das große Panama Spiel
overview: A small bear and a small tiger live in their house by a river, minding their own business, when one day a crate is swept ashore from a place called Panama with nothing but bananas inside - the favorite food of the two. Convinced that this Panama must be some paradise just bursting with bananas, the two set off to find it. Play the tiger, with the bear providing needful advice. In this action/adventure, the player has to overcome obstacles, solve puzzles, and outsmart evil pirates who have their own plans with those two. Based on the world created by the German children's book author Janosch, this game aims at young children.
